Job Title: Payments Operations Manager

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
ProfitSolv is a SaaS business services provider for the legal and accounting industry. We are looking for a Payments Operations Manager to join our growing team!
The Payments Operations Manager will oversee and streamline all payments revenue-related processes to enhance efficiency and drive revenue retention. As the Payments Operations Manager, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams, lead payments operations teams, and leverage data-driven insights to optimize revenue optimization and retention. 
What we provide: Opportunity to Invest in Your Future. We offer a 401K match.Paid Time Off. Enjoy paid time off and paid holidays.Great Coverage. Take advantage of health, dental, and vision HSA and FSA policies.A Great Team. Collaborate with smart, curious, hardworking individuals.Performance Compensation. Be rewarded for your hard work with performance-based merits.Casual Environment. Be comfortable in our casual dress environment.Remote Work. Want to work from home? No problem!
As a Payments Operations Manager, you will: Coach, mentor, and lead a payments operations team, including training, development, performance measurement, project oversight, and process implementation for support and activations. Act as a liaison between Payments Support and Business Unit Product/Engineering in resolving support situations. Assist with utilizing payments tools, researching situations, and elevating calls to payment processing partners as necessary. Identify and resolve service issues with processing partners, including impact assessment, escalation, and conclusion. Ensure the Company operates in accordance with the payments card industry requirements as adopted and mandated by the business. Oversee ongoing development of key operational processes and procedures from inception through implementation into core adoption. Serve as a key stakeholder in critical customer experience/service Change Management and evolution initiatives. 
This position follows established policies and procedures to keep confidential information secure.
A great fit for this position has: Minimum 5 years' experience in high demand payment operations or related SaaS software environment, preferred.3 yearsâ€™ management experience preferred. Prior experience in delivering high-quality services associated to time-critical client business. Experience in utilizing a range of customer relationship and customer success applications. Familiarity with in-house processing platforms. A background of interaction and familiarity with Risk/Underwriting and Compliance protocols. 
Additional desirable qualifications: Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong time management skills. Strong initiative and sound decision-making ability.Prolonged periods sitting at a desk and working on a computer. Must be able to lift up to 15 pounds at times.Ability to travel as needed.
Our commitment to you:
At ProfitSolv, we are committed to being a diverse and inclusive workplace as an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, genetic information, or any other characteristic protected by law. We embrace a diverse group of backgrounds and experiences to connect with clients, solve problems and innovate.

Experience Level (if available): None
